author: ask
msg: A few changes to the documentation and makepl_args.mod_perl. (Added PERL_TIE_TABLES and more)

author: dougm
msg: Apache::read_client_block will now use safemalloc/safefree, rather
than palloc, so memory is released after each read(), rather than at
the end of a request.  (e.g. so file uploads don't cause too much growth)

author: rse
msg: Provide default IFS (DIFS) and correct some tabs to spaces.
